title: Best of the Program | Guest: Rep. Chris Stewart | 9/30/22
description:
Rep. Chris Stewart explains what's going on with Russia's Nord Stream pipelines. Bill O'Reilly joins to discuss the week's biggest news, including President Biden's latest senior moment, the upcoming midterms, and his newest book, "Killing the Legends." Author Michael Malice discusses the possibility of a Gavin Newsom/Kamala Harris face-off in 2024 and what's happening with the Nord Stream pipelines.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
